Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage Fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Genuineness of marriage for immigration purposes
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal following refusal of sponsorship application
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative – inconsistencies in testimonies regarding meeting dates, financial details, and living arrangements
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 4 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage was genuine and not entered into primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Contradictions in evidence and lack of credible explanations
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Section 4, Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Genuine marriage not primarily for immigration benefit
Crimes.Application_Factor: Inconsistencies in relationship timeline and shared life details
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Section 4, Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credible evidence supporting genuine marital relationship
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Section 4, Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistent testimony on key relationship facts
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No procedural unfairness alleged or found
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant credibility concerns due to contradictions
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Judicial review challenging reasonableness of IAD decision
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review on judicial review
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to provide consistent and corroborative evidence
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Misrepresentation related to genuineness of marriage

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether misrepresentation occurred through false or misleading information about marriage
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal following refusal based on alleged misrepresentation
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative – inconsistent accounts of arranged marriage and cultural practices
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 40 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: No misrepresentation; discrepancies due to cultural differences and memory lapses
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of consistency and insufficient justification for discrepancies
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Section 40, Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Misrepresentation involving false or misleading information material to immigration application
Crimes.Application_Factor: Contradictory statements about nature and development of marriage
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Sponsorship refused due to perceived misrepresentation, appeal dismissed
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether IAD’s finding of misrepresentation was reasonable
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Section 40, Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Inconsistent evidence leading to belief in misrepresentation
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Section 40, Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to reconcile contradictions in testimony
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Serious credibility concerns affecting reliability of claims
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Judicial review asserting unreasonableness of IAD’s conclusion
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Scope of judicial review of administrative decisions
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose consistent and verifiable details
